patthana13.11:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found.
patthana13.11:0.3_0: as one should gap into the stilt household.
patthana13.11:1.0_0: ‘ cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause
patthana13.11:1.1_0: There is a trainee that gives rise to the Truth.
patthana13.11:1.1_1: There is a trainee that gives rise to many people.
patthana13.11:1.1_2: There is a trainee that gives rise to the entire spectrum of many people.
patthana13.11:1.1_3: only for a trainee, not an assembly of many qualities, nor for one, causes and reasons.
patthana13.11:1.1_4: A trainee doesn’t arise for an assembly of many hundreds.
patthana13.11:2.1_0: You don’t have the virtue of an adept.
patthana13.11:2.1_1: You don’t have the virtue of an adept.
patthana13.11:2.1_2: You don’t teach the Dhamma for an adept.
patthana13.11:2.1_3: There are no cause or condition for the virtue of an adept. Name and the phenomena that arise from causes.
patthana13.11:2.1_4: There are no cause or condition that gives rise to many qualities.
patthana13.11:3.1_0: Though I neither gives rise to the Teaching nor the wholesome qualities that arise.
patthana13.11:3.1_1: Though I neither gives rise to the ending of many teachings.
patthana13.11:3.1_2: Though I don’t look forward to the teaching of many hundreds, and neither causes nor reasons.
patthana13.11:4.1_0: Neither takes pleasure to the end of the trainee, and the teaching of many people.
patthana13.11:4.1_1: Neither a trainee, the teaching, and the Saṅgha of many things, causes and reasons.
patthana13.11:4.1_2: Breaking a trainee, they don’t mix closely with their hundreds, and neither causes nor reasons.
patthana13.11:5.1_0: Neither an adept doesn’t give rise to the Teaching of an adept.
patthana13.11:5.1_1: Neither an adept doesn’t give rise to the Teaching of an adept.
patthana13.11:5.1_2: Neither an adept doesn’t give rise to diversity of principles, nor for causes and reasons.
patthana13.11:6.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
